pages.text: $(bgreen)Spike Weed$() keeps close track of his favorite players. And he consistently cleans up in the office hockey pool. Just one problem: he's terrified of pucks.$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)100$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Little Fast$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(l)close attack$() plant that deals damage to any grounded enemy that $(l)walks on top of him$() every 2 seconds.
$(bpurple)Special :$() Most zombies $(l)can't track him as target$(). It can $(bred)pop tires of cars$().$(br)$(bgreen)Plant Food :$() It will obtain $(l)several chances$() to resist crush damage.
